properties.title: Concierge OSGi - An optimized OSGi R3 implementation for mobile and embedded systems - Concierge on Intel iMote2
properties.author: Jan S. Rellermeyer

meta.name: description
meta.content: Concierge is an optimized OSGi R3 implementation with a minimal file and memory footprint, which makes it ideal for small and embedded devices.

section.name: Concierge on Intel iMote2
section.p: We have written a small tutorial on how to run Linux and Java on iMote2. Concierge runs with the Blackdown VM from our flash image or with JamVM.
